name: Kittenheart Warrior 3D
description:
The aliens are back and they've been wrecking the city you live in, so get your cat and don the shoes of Kittenheart Warrior again, then use your hands to kick some cheeks or something. Who knows, maybe you'll discover something sinister lurking just outside the town while wiping out the otherwordly threat?

Upgrade your fingergun & your cat and grow your arse-nal with 8 (or nine if you want to count both of the sticks) new weapons including a dagger-slingshot. Some weapons are hidden (two of them are skippable if not found in their respective levels), so make sure to pillage every nook and cranny!

[CONTROLS]

WSAD to walk

Arrow key to skip/scroll through the mission intros

Mouse to look around and shoot

Spacebar to open doors

Shift to scroll through your available weapons

Kill enemies to make them dead.

Disclaimer: Just like the original Kittenheart Warrior, it's a conversion of a non-public game I've made many months ago as a birthday gift for my friend; I've condensed the narrative, swapped some graphics and sounds, added some cool, new intros and done some rebalancing. The game was made with Raycasting Game Maker, available at https://www.moddb.com/engines/raycasting-game-maker . Being made with an external engine, the game has a few weird gimmicks, so make sure to read the in-game tutorial textwall.

Have fun~
